unnormalised: **Brand Collabs: It's Raining Influencer Deals This Festive Season!**
normalised: **Brand Collaborations: It's Raining Influencer Deals This Festive Season!**

unnormalised: Social media's buzzing! It seems every other influencer from Mumbai to Manipur is announcing a brand collaboration. Forget subtle, brands are going all out this Onam season, partnering with creators to push everything from ethnic wear to...well, everything!
normalised: Social media's buzzing! It seems every other influencer from Mumbai to Manipur is announcing a brand collaboration. Forget subtle, brands are going all out this Onam season, partnering with creators to push everything from ethnic wear to...well, everything!

unnormalised: Remember last year's biryani wars fueled by brand X vs. brand Y endorsements? Expect something similar this year, but bigger!
normalised: Remember last year's biryani wars fueled by brand X versus brand Y endorsements? Expect something similar this year, but bigger!

unnormalised: Fashion bloggers like Aisha Khanna are raking in the Rs., with multiple tie-ups. Even your average food blogger reviewing dhabas in Delhi is suddenly a "brand ambassador" for spices. Is this oversaturation? Maybe.
normalised: Fashion bloggers like Aisha Khanna are raking in the rupees, with multiple tie-ups. Even your average food blogger reviewing dhabas in Delhi is suddenly a "brand ambassador" for spices. Is this oversaturation? Maybe.

unnormalised: But hey, brands seem to think splashing the cash is worth it. Experts say it's all about tapping into that hyper-local reach. After all, 1000 micro-influencers might just be more effective than one Bollywood star these days, right?
normalised: But hey, brands seem to think splashing the cash is worth it. Experts say it's all about tapping into that hyper-local reach. After all, one thousand micro-influencers might just be more effective than one Bollywood star these days, right?

unnormalised: Think about it: brands are essentially sponsoring your auntie's Facebook feed. Wild, isn't it? Keep an eye out for more collabs as Diwali approaches.
normalised: Think about it: brands are essentially sponsoring your auntie's Facebook feed. Wild, isn't it? Keep an eye out for more collaborations as Diwali approaches.
